U

UniformityPolicy - Class in myVelibCore.planningPolicyPackage
Uniformity planning policy This belong to the Strategy Pattern Planning policy of a planning ride Preservation of uniformity of bicycles distribution amongst stations: with this policy the choice of the source and destination station is affected by the number of available bikes (at source station) and free slots (at destination).
UniformityPolicy() - Constructor for class myVelibCore.planningPolicyPackage.UniformityPolicy
 
unregisterObserverDeparture(User) - Method in class myVelibCore.stationPackage.Station
This method register the users who have rented their bike or changed their plan
unregisterObserverDestination(User) - Method in class myVelibCore.stationPackage.Station
This method register the users who have returned their bike or changed their plan
updateDeparture(boolean, boolean) - Method in class myVelibCore.userAndCardPackage.User
If the departure station becomes unavailable, the user can find another path.
updateDestination(boolean, boolean) - Method in class myVelibCore.userAndCardPackage.User
If the departure station becomes unavailable, the user can find another path.
updateTime() - Method in class myVelibCore.utilities.Time
 
User - Class in myVelibCore.userAndCardPackage
This class defines users

UserLastInput - Class in myVelibCore.userAndCardPackage
This class stores the last inputs of the user It stores : The GPS coordinates of the last wanted destination The last wanted policy The last wanted type of bicycle
UserLastInput() - Constructor for class myVelibCore.userAndCardPackage.UserLastInput

Constructor with parameters
UserStatitics - Class in myVelibCore.userAndCardPackage
This class stores statistics for each user The data stored are : Number of user's rides The total time the user spent on a bike The total amount of charges The total time-credit earned by the user
